name: Leanne Graham
quote: It is one of the most successful project management applications on the market and has a number of common features applicable to a wide range of companies and users.

name: Barry Spence
quote: Helium is the solution I found most appropriate for our work. It's customizable enough for each team member to easily see the big picture and achieve the desired result.

name: Ervin Howell
quote: Helium takes things to the next level. Keeping track of each part and task so that all the elements are in place on the day of launch is not an easy task. Helium allows us to do so more accurately, thereby reducing our costs.

name: Clementine Bauch
quote: Designed to meet the needs of small teams, Helium helps your employees stay connected by easily identifying the tasks they need to focus on and blocking those that are irrelevant or less important.

name: Patricia Lebsack
quote: I'm really impressed with the simplicity and flexibility of the Helium app. Our team members don't need to spend much time on registration of the working time and our clients are satisfied with the received reports.
